articles.description: The Spanish flu infected around 500 million people worldwide
articles.content:
Until recently, the prospect of social distancing and having to self-isolate in our own homes was unfamiliar to us all.
 But since the country was put into lockdown on March 23, social distancing has become more important than ever in helping to slow the spr… [+5477 chars]

Results could be available as soon as September, the researchers say. The trial is not yet open to recruitment, but will be announced in due course.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Scientists conclude people cannot be infected twice - Sky News
articles.description: A total of 277 patients in the country were believed to have fallen ill for a second time, as had patients in China and Japan.
